820490.name: Subsideria Original Soundtrack
820490.description:
The full Subsideria soundtrack as high quality WAV files including an exclusive bonus track. The original soundtrack contains 12 tracks:

  • 1. Amidst Shadows - 1:40
  • 2. Beyond The Skies - 4:06
  • 3. Beyond The Skies (Classic) - 4:06
  • 4. Death's Door - 4:25
  • 5. Death's Door (Classic) - 4:22
  • 6. Void's Gaze - 3:42
  • 7. Serpent's Lair - 3:08
  • 8. End Bringer - 3:27
  • 9. We Will Suffer No More - 3:22
  • 10. The Time Has Come - 0:44
  • 11. Emerging Light - 3:43
  • 12. Forgotten Joy (Exclusive bonus track) - 2:13
820490.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 罗马尼亚语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
